display_long_description:
It's almost midnight on Hallowe'en, and things are about to get spooky in this multi-dimensional graveyard!

This is a roomscale boundary, single-player, mixed reality, shooting gallery with a Hallowe'en theme, with spooky effects, sounds and music.  Great for kids of all ages, nothing is too scary when you have a raygun to hand! 

Works great in the garden, especially at night!  (take care not to stand in the roses!)

There are a couple of funny jump scares, but otherwise, it's just great, Hallowe'en fun!

Players should carefully walk around the mixed reality graveyard and shoot the skulls and pumpkins to earn points.  Best overall scores are saved locally and can be seen on the large headstone and the ray gun.

As you walk around enjoy the multi-dimensional effects where other dimensions have broken through to ours!

There's a clock ticking, when the bells sound midnight, it's almost time to reset and go again for another high score.

How many skulls and pumpkins can you 'pop?'.

*mixed reality is when you can see the physical world in the headset along with game graphics, mixed over the top - looks fab!
